p: A total of 0.5 g of Na-CMC was added into 10 mL of hot distilled water and allowed to stand for 15 min to obtain a transparent feature, crushed to form a homogeneous gel, and diluted with distilled water. Distilled water was added to mark boundaries (Moghimipour et al. 2013). This suspension was used as a carrier of P. odoratissimus extract.
